Uses of Class
platform.game.Actor

  • Packages that use Actor 
    Package Description
    platform.game
    Base package of the game's engine.
    platform.game.block
    Package containing all Block-related Actors.
    platform.game.button
    Package containing all Button-related Actors.
    platform.game.character
    Package containing all Character-related Actors.
    platform.game.graphic
    Package containing all Graphic-related Actors.
    platform.game.item
    Package containing all collectible Actors.
    platform.game.level
    Package containing all Levels.
    platform.game.linkable
    Package containing all linkable Actors.
    platform.game.misc
    Package containing all other Actors.
    platform.game.passive
    Package containing all passive Actors.
    platform.game.signal
    Package containing all Signals.
    platform.game.weapon
    Package containing all weapon-related Actors.

    • Uses of Actor in platform.game

      Subclasses of Actor in platform.game 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Arrow
      Arrow represents an Actor dealing ARROW type damages.
      class  Eraser
      Can erase existing Actors, e.g. in the level Builder.
      class  Overlay
      Overlay prompts specific informations about the Player, also adds the possibility to change the gravity through SelectGravity
      Fields in platform.game declared as Actor 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Actor Arrow.owner
      Indicates who shot the arrow
      private Actor Eraser.target
      Target of the Eraser
      private Actor Arrow.target
      Indicates where the arrow has landed
      Fields in platform.game with type parameters of type Actor 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private SortedCollection<Actor> Simulator.actors
      List containing all current Actors.
      private java.util.ArrayList<Actor> Simulator.registered
      List containing all Actors waiting to be registered
      private java.util.ArrayList<Actor> Simulator.unregistered
      List containing all Actors waiting to be unregistered.
      Methods in platform.game that return Actor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Actor Eraser.copie() 
      Actor Actor.copie()
      Returns a "copy ready" instance of Actor
      Methods in platform.game with parameters of type Actor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int Actor.compareTo(Actor other) 
      boolean Actor.hurt(Actor instigator, Damage type, double amount, Vector location)
      Used in interactions between Actors
      int World.hurt(Box area, Actor instigator, Damage type, double amount, Vector location)
      Sets a "hurting zone" in the World.
      int Simulator.hurt(Box area, Actor instigator, Damage type, double amount, Vector location) 
      void Eraser.interact(Actor other) 
      void Arrow.interact(Actor other) 
      void Actor.interact(Actor other)
      Used to simulate the interactions between all Actors.
      void World.register(Actor actor)
      Adds the actor to the registered/unregistered arrays of the World.
      void Simulator.register(Actor actor) 
      void World.unregister(Actor actor) 
      void Simulator.unregister(Actor actor) 
      Constructors in platform.game with parameters of type Actor 
      Constructor and Description
      Arrow(Box box, Vector velocity, Actor owner)
      Full constructor.
      Arrow(Vector position, Vector velocity, Actor owner)
      Constructor without any box, standard size.

      Simple solid actor that does nothing.

      Block that can be destroyed by fire or explosions.

    • Uses of Actor in platform.game.button

      Subclasses of Actor in platform.game.button 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Button
      A button is a block that changes appearance when hovered by the mouse and is mapped to a specific shortcut.
      class  LoadLevel
      LoadLevel is a Button that loads a specified Level.
      class  Spawn
      Spawn is a class that Spawns actors.
      class  SuperSpawner
      SuperSpawner is a subclass of Button containing several Spawns.
      class  ToNextLevel
      LoadLevel is a Button that launches a specified Level.
      Fields in platform.game.button declared as Actor 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Actor Spawn.actor
      Spawns the Actor stored in this variable
      private Actor Spawn.newActor
      Is used to track the newly created Actor
      private Actor Spawn.sourceSprite
      Sprite of an actor that is in collision with the spawn
      Fields in platform.game.button with type parameters of type Actor 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<Actor> Spawn.toUnregister
      Is used to unregister all Actors (mainly SuperSpawners) from the level
      Methods in platform.game.button with parameters of type Actor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Spawn.interact(Actor other) 
      Constructors in platform.game.button with parameters of type Actor 
      Constructor and Description
      Spawn(Box box, java.lang.String sprite, Actor actor)
      Constructor used to Spawn another Actor than the Player, without any shortcut nor a second Sprite
      Spawn(Box box, java.lang.String sprite, Actor actor, int shortcut)
      Constructor used to Spawn another Actor than the Player, without a second Sprite.
      Spawn(Box box, java.lang.String spriteOff, java.lang.String spriteOn, Actor actor)
      Constructor used to Spawn another Actor than the Player, without any shortcut.
      Spawn(Box box, java.lang.String spriteOff, java.lang.String spriteOn, Actor actor, java.util.ArrayList<Actor> toUnregister)
      Constructor used to Spawn the Player, without any shortcut.
      Spawn(Box box, java.lang.String spriteOff, java.lang.String spriteOn, Actor actor, java.util.ArrayList<Actor> toUnregister, int shortcut)
      Full constructor used to Spawn the Player.
      Spawn(Box box, java.lang.String spriteOff, java.lang.String spriteOn, Actor actor, int shortcut)
      Full constructor used to Spawn another Actor than the Player.
      Constructor parameters in platform.game.button with type arguments of type Actor 
      Constructor and Description
      Spawn(Box box, java.lang.String spriteOff, java.lang.String spriteOn, Actor actor, java.util.ArrayList<Actor> toUnregister)
      Constructor used to Spawn the Player, without any shortcut.
      Spawn(Box box, java.lang.String spriteOff, java.lang.String spriteOn, Actor actor, java.util.ArrayList<Actor> toUnregister, int shortcut)
      Full constructor used to Spawn the Player.

    • Uses of Actor in platform.game.graphic

      Subclasses of Actor in platform.game.graphic 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BackgroundImage
      Sets an image in the background of the world.
      class  Digit
      Creates an imaged composed of a one-digit or a two-digit number.
      class  End
      Proposes a smooth transition to the next Level after a violent death
      class  Image 
      class  SelectGravity
      Allows the user to change the Gravity.

    • Uses of Actor in platform.game.level

      Subclasses of Actor in platform.game.level 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Builder
      Level which allows the user to Build its own level via Serialization.
      class  Level
      Base class for level factories, which provides fade in transition.
      class  Level01 
      class  Level02
      Second level of the standard game.
      class  Level03 
      class  Level04 
      class  LevelSelection
      Allows the user to chose a Level in the standard game.
      class  Loading
      Level which allows the user to load a previously created Level in Builder.
      class  Menu
      First level of the game, allows the user to chose another Level.

    • Uses of Actor in platform.game.misc

      Subclasses of Actor in platform.game.misc 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Debris
      Spawns a few "debris" around a block that exploded/has been destroyed.
      class  Limits
      Delimits a zone outside of which some Actors can be killed.
      class  Particle
      Spawns a Particle that has a limited lifespan.

    • Uses of Actor in platform.game.weapon

      Subclasses of Actor in platform.game.weapon 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ArrowDispenser
      Block that throw an arrow each x seconds.
      class  Bomb
      Bomb represents an Actor dealing EXPLOSION type Damages.
      class  Fireball
      Fireball represents an Actor dealing FIRE type Damages.
      Fields in platform.game.weapon declared as Actor 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Actor Fireball.owner
      Indicates the "owner" of the Fireball, i.e. the one who registered it in the World.
      private Actor Bomb.owner
      Indicates the "owner" of the Bomb, i.e. the one who registered it in the World.
